aircraft.value: Titan Heavy - AC-6977-948 at Zone-3 Facility

defect_observed.value: Connector corrosion causing signal degradation. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Battery Management component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage

preventive_action.value: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 23/08/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 25/08/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 26/08/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 28/08/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 30/08/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi
